mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, dueDate, remove from tbl_board where bno > 0 and remove = 1 order by bno desc limit #{skip}, #{size}
select count(*) from (select bno from tbl_board where bno > 0 limit #{countEnd}) board
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (title, content, writer, dueDate) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, now())
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title = '', content = '', writer = '', dueDate = null, updateDate = now(), remove = false where bno = #{bno}
update tbl_board set title = #{br.title}, content = #{br.content}, writer = #{br.writer}, updateDate = now() where bno = #{bno}
